user.title: NaviLink Credentials
user.description: Please enter your NaviLink account credentials

pick_gateway.title: Select NaviLink Device
pick_gateway.description: Please select the NaviLink device you would like to set up. Listed below are the names you assigend to your NaviLink hub when you set it up.

set_polling_interval.title: NaviLink Polling Interval
set_polling_interval.description: Indicate how often you would like to poll the NaviLink Hub (Minumum allowed interval is 10 seconds, maximum is 120 seconds.)

abort.no_devices_available: No devices available with the provided account credentials, aborting...
